sentence.text: ` We shall ascend the mountain , " said Miss Fergusson .
Soon , clouds spilled over Carn Dearg and it darkened suddenly as I ascended the mountain .
I slowly ascend the stairs , the copper behind me .
Over many years I have ascended the steep final slopes to the broad top often .
The priest ascended the steps to the pulpit .
He drove leisurely up the country lane and ascended the hill , before bearing left along the escarpment .
I ascended the steps ; although these tombs have no side-walls but are closed in by arches and lattices , they are very dark inside .
I saw the mouse ascend the ancient timepiece ,
He ascended the steps of the altar very solemnly , and joined his hands before his face for a final convulsive moment of prayer , his eyes closed .
Miss Kenton was still waiting for me in the hallway and we ascended through the house in silence .
The earth was soft here and the feet of the ladder began to sink as he ascended .
From here the Prophet ascended to the heavens and was permitted to glimpse paradise .
The rock on the Temple Mount from which he ascended , at or close to the site of the ruined Temple , was commemorated by the construction of the Dome of the Rock in 691 .
